name: My zero trip
description: My zero trip is a nice animated clicker. Here you can walk and ... walk :) Atmosphere is a meditative process of walking, humor and reasoning of the author.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows XP/7/8/8.1/10 Процессор: 1.2 Ghz or faster processor Оперативная память: 256 MB ОЗУ Видеокарта: 256 MB Место на диске: 150 MB
